alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.1
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.1 to testers in the beta update channel.

Here's what's new:

  • Now compatible with Windows 8.1/8 and 7
  • Fixed Welcome Screen scaling bug
  • Fixed bugs for RTs with Media (on lightbox)
  • Improved 'Filtered by' text
  • Improved the UI for smaller displays
  • Lots of performance improvements and bug fixes
